pkgmetadata.longdescription: Competing Risks Regression for Stratified and Clustered Data // Extension of 'cmprsk' to Stratified and Clustered data. A goodness of fit test for Fine-Gray model is also provided. Methods are detailed in the following articles: Zhou et al. (2011) doi:10.1111/j.1541-0420.2010.01493.x, Zhou et al. (2012) doi:10.1093/biostatistics/kxr032, Zhou et al. (2013) doi: 10.1002/sim.5815.
